q1: Did you expect Croatia to win?
a1: No, Croatia had a good run, but France are a class act.
a2: I would think so. Their midfield is strong.
q3: I think Croatia will do well as long as they keep training and working hard. They have the potential to be a good team.
a3: I agree. I liken them to be the next Germany  when they played in 2014
q4: Croatia national football team have appeared in the FIFA World Cup on five occasions (in 1998, 2002, 2006, 2014 and 2018).
a5: Croatia will be a better team for the next World Cup
